Pixel art, 1:1 sprite, top-down isometric 3/4 view. Single adult male villager, consistent design across all views: white tunic with a dark gray outline along the shirt edges, brown belt, tan pants, dark brown boots, light skin, short brown hair. Neutral standing pose, full body centered, zoomed to fill most of the frame with a little padding. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, readable at a glance. Facing {dir_upper} (map north is up). {orientation} Transparent background (true alpha), no checkerboard, no white/gray backdrop. No text, no UI, no extra props, no weapons.
